content.question: Ideas expressed by Douglass in the excerpt were most likely interpreted as supporting which of the following arguments?

choices.label: The war would make African Americans feel free.
The war was the product of years of injustice against African Americans.
The war would take enormous sacrifice of military combat to achieve victory.
The war was no longer just about preserving the union of the states.

content.answer: The war was no longer just about preserving the union of the states.

topic.text: 5.9: Government Policies During the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
